Text:
No Comments?
I'm guessing everyone is fine?
(Just asking, seeing as it was my first, LOL)
poor instructions. unclear and confusing. dont know if it works or not.
step 5. WTH are you talking about?

@SLiP2010 - Step 5 > Is for the patcher. I meant explorer, but there are different words for it. once you are in the patcher it will ask you to open a file, click open & below it says File Type - Select .Exe (The filetype dropdown box went weird, and i cba fixing it, lol) once you have .exe selected browse over to the directory you installed the software in, and select SuperAntiSpyware.exe, in the root folder of Super antispyware.
@SLiP2010 - Sorry for the unclear instructions, Was busy and confused myself, seeing as this was the first time i done it :)
